Articles.Content:
**Focke-Wulf Fw 190 for 1.0.2.** 

![0su9kXM.png](http://i.imgur.com/0su9kXM.png)

[More pictures](http://imgur.com/a/xNynq)

I couldn't find a good replica of the Fw 190 so I decided to put a simple one together.

This craft requires [Kerbal Aircraft Expansion for 1.0.2.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-1-0-2-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-5-1) but is otherwise stock. I tried to strike a balance between low part count, faithfulness to the historical design, and performance. This plane flies beautifully and is very manoeuvrable and easy to fly and land. Top speed about 100m/s at low altitude. With SAS on, it takes off automatically at about 30m/s. Recommended landing speed no more than 40-50m/s. Turn off the engine just before touchdown and apply brakes immediately, otherwise it will take too long to come to a stop on the single rear brake (enabling the front brakes will cause the plane to tip over). Replace the radial engine with a turboprop for more realistic speeds but with historically inaccurate technology.

[KerbalX link for craft file](http://kerbalx.com/repbasic/Focke-Wulf-Fw-190)
